description.value:
Aura 10

Fey allies score critical hits on rolls of 19-20 while in the aura.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ weapon

Standard

Attack: Melee 1 (one creature)

+12 vs. AC

Hit: 2d8 + 6 damage. If the target is granting combat advantage, it also falls prone.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ force, implement

Standard

Attack: Ranged 10 (one creature)

+10 vs. Reflex

Hit: 2d6 + 4 force damage.

Recharge 5-6 ✦ weapon

Standard

Attack: Melee 1 (one creature)

+12 vs. AC

Hit: 3d8 + 8 damage, and the target is restrained until the end of Querelian's next turn. If the target is granting combat advantage, it also falls prone.

Special: Querelian can use this power in place of an opportunity attack.

Recharge 5-6

Standard

Effect: Querelian shifts up to his speed and then uses longsword.

Recharge on a miss ✦ charm, weapon

Standard

Attack: Melee 1 (one creature)

+12 vs. AC

Hit: 2d8 + 6 damage, and the target is beguiled (save ends). While the target is beguiled, it makes an opportunity attack against any one of its allies that attacks Querelian.

Encounter ✦ teleportation

Move

Effect: Querelian teleports up to 5 squares.

At-Will ✦ radiant

Minor

Effect: Close burst 10 (one enemy in the burst). Querelian marks the target until the end of the encounter or until he uses this power again. While an enemy is marked by Querelian, it takes 4 radiant damage whenever it ends its turn without attacking Querelian.

Recharge 6

Minor

Effect: Querelian makes saving throws against each effect on him that a save can end.

At-Will

Triggered

Trigger: An attack damages an ally.

Effect (Immediate Interrupt): Close burst 5 (the triggering ally in the burst). The target takes half damage from the triggering attack, and the eladrin takes an equal amount of damage.

system.biography:
HP 154; Bloodied 77Init +11 | AP 1 | Save +2, +9 against charm effects
AC 23Fort 19Ref 21Will 17
Speed 5
Ability ScoresStr 18 (+7)
Con 13 (+4)		Dex 22 (+9)
Int 14 (+5)		Wis 13 (+4)
Cha 16 (+6)
Languages Common, Elven
Alignment Evil
Skills Athletics +12, History +10, Nature +9Senses Low-light vision
Passive Perception 14 | Insight 14

Equipment chainmail , light shield , longsword .

Traits
